tooltip控件

\n

当您想要描述一个链接的时候，提示工具（Tooltip）就显得非常有用。

\n

示例

\n

##四个方向tooltip

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
默认向上显示
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
向下显示
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
向左显示
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
向右显示
\n
\n
\n
<div id='example2'>
\n <div class="tooltip top active" role="tooltip" >
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">默认向上显示</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n<div id='example2'>
\n <div class="tooltip bottom active" role="tooltip">
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">向下显示</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n<div id='example2'>
\n <div class="tooltip left active" role="tooltip">
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">向左显示</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n<div id='example2'>
\n <div class="tooltip right active" role="tooltip">
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">向右显示</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n
\n
 #example3,#example2{
\n margin: 10px;
\n float: left;
\n}
\n#example2 .tooltip,#example3 .tooltip{
\n position: relative;
\n}
\n
\n \n

##多种颜色tooltip

\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
primary tooltip
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
info tooltip
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
warning tooltip
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
success tooltip
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
\n
danger tooltip
\n
\n
\n
 #example3,#example2{
\n margin: 10px;
\n float: left;
\n}
\n#example2 .tooltip,#example3 .tooltip{
\n position: relative;
\n}
\n
\n
<div id='example3'>
\n <div class="tooltip tooltip-primary top active" role="tooltip">
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">primary tooltip</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n<div id='example3'>
\n <div class="tooltip tooltip-info top active" role="tooltip">
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">info tooltip</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n<div id='example3'>
\n <div class="tooltip tooltip-warning top active" role="tooltip">
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">warning tooltip</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n<div id='example3'>
\n <div class="tooltip tooltip-success top active" role="tooltip">
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">success tooltip</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n<div id='example3'>
\n <div class="tooltip tooltip-danger top active" role="tooltip" >
\n <div class="tooltip-arrow"></div>
\n <div class="tooltip-inner">danger tooltip</div>
\n </div>
\n</div>
\n
